name: documentSolutionTables
friendlyName: Mightora Power Platform Table Documentation Generator
instanceNameFormat: Mightora Power Platform Table Documentation Generator
description: Streamline the documentation process for Dataverse entities with this automated task. It extracts entity details, including attributes and properties, from the Entity.xml files in your unpacked solution and generates Markdown documentation. You can choose to output the documentation into a single file or separate files for each entity. This task simplifies managing and understanding Dataverse tables, providing readable and accessible entity schema documentation.
author: mightoraio

inputs.name: locationOfUnpackedSolution
inputs.label: Unpacked Solution Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the directory containing the Dataverse unpacked Solution, each of which should have an Entity.xml file.

inputs.name: wikiLocation
inputs.label: Wiki Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory where the generated Markdown documentation files will be stored. If this directory doesn't exist, the script will create it.

inputs.name: useSingleFile
inputs.label: Output to Single File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between: True = output to Single File or false = File per Table.
